createTables.createCategoriesTable: CREATE TABLE categories (id serial, category_name varchar(50) NOT NULL, category_id serial, category_position_in_list bigint NOT NULL, category_description text, category_start_date varchar(200), category_image oid, category_parent_id bigint REFERENCES categories (category_id)  ON UPDATE CASCADE  ON DELETE CASCADE, CONSTRAINT pk_category_id PRIMARY KEY (category_id), CHECK (category_position_in_list > 0));
createTables.createProductsTable: CREATE TABLE products (id serial, product_id serial, product_position_in_list bigint NOT NULL, product_display bool DEFAULT(FALSE), product_parent_id bigint REFERENCES categories(category_id) ON UPDATE CASCADE ON DELETE CASCADE NOT NULL, product_full_name varchar(10000) NOT NULL, product_short_name varchar(2000) NOT NULL,product_short_description text NOT NULL, product_full_description text NOT NULL, product_specification json, product_prices json, product_price varchar(200), product_photosUrls text, product_discounts text, product_discountsValues json, product_brand_id bigint REFERENCES brands(brand_id) NOT NULL, product_stock bool DEFAULT(FALSE), product_quantityStock bigint DEFAULT(0), product_quantityOrders bigint DEFAULT(0), product_quantitySendItems bigint DEFAULT(0), product_quantityPaidItems bigint DEFAULT(0), product_raiting float4 DEFAULT(0), product_barcode_EAN13 bigint, product_barcode_UPC bigint, product_start_date bigint NOT NULL, product_end_date bigint, CONSTRAINT pk_product_id PRIMARY KEY ( product_id ), CHECK (product_position_in_list > 0), CHECK (product_quantityStock >= 0), CHECK (product_quantityOrders >= 0), CHECK (product_quantityPaidItems >= 0), CHECK (product_quantitySendItems >= 0));
createTables.createSliderTable: CREATE TABLE slider (id serial, slider_position_in_list bigint NOT NULL, slider_name varchar(2500), slider_description varchar(2500), slider_url varchar(2500), slider_display bool DEFAULT(FALSE), slider_id serial, slider_image_name varchar(1000) NOT NULL UNIQUE, slider_image oid NOT NULL, CONSTRAINT pk_slider_id PRIMARY KEY (slider_id));
createTables.createBrandsTable: CREATE TABLE brands (id serial, brand_id serial, brand_name varchar(2000), brand_photo oid, brand_description varchar(5000), brand_url varchar(5000), CONSTRAINT pk_brand_id PRIMARY KEY (brand_id));
createTables.createCurrenciesTable: CREATE TABLE currencies (id serial, currency_id serial, currency_country varchar(1000) NOT NULL, currency_iso_code varchar(20) NOT NULL, currency_iso_number_code bigint NOT NULL, currency_numeric_code varchar(20) NOT NULL, currency_value float4 NOT NULL, currency_default bool DEFAULT(FALSE), currency_last_update varchar(500) NOT NULL, CONSTRAINT pk_currency_id PRIMARY KEY (currency_id), CHECK (currency_value > 0));
createTables.createCurrenciesHistoryTable: CREATE TABLE currenciesHistory (id serial, currency_history_id serial, currency_parent_id bigint REFERENCES currencies (currency_id)  ON UPDATE CASCADE  ON DELETE CASCADE, currency_history_date_update bigint NOT NULL, currency_history_value float4 NOT NULL, currency_history_difference float4 NOT NULL, CONSTRAINT pk_currency_history_id PRIMARY KEY (currency_history_id), CHECK (currency_history_value > 0));
createTables.createPricesTable: CREATE TABLE prices (id serial, price_id serial, price_name varchar(1000) NOT NULL, price_description varchar(5000), price_calculation_percent float4 DEFAULT NULL, price_base bool DEFAULT (FALSE), price_calculation_method varchar(200) NOT NULL, price_default bool DEFAULT (FALSE), price_include_tax bool DEFAULT (TRUE), price_country json DEFAULT (NULL), CONSTRAINT pk_price_id PRIMARY KEY (price_id));
createTables.createPricesRulesTable: CREATE TABLE pricesRules (id serial, price_rules_base_id bigint REFERENCES prices (price_id), price_rules_integer bool DEFAULT (FALSE), price_rules_round_to float4 NOT NULL, price_rules_default_id bigint REFERENCES prices (price_id), CONSTRAINT pk_priceRules_id PRIMARY KEY (id));
createTables.createSpecificationsTable: CREATE TABLE specifications (id serial, specification_id serial, specification_parent_id bigint REFERENCES specifications (specification_id) ON UPDATE CASCADE ON DELETE CASCADE, specification_position_list bigint, specification_name varchar(5000) NOT NULL, specification_description varchar(5000), specification_values json, CONSTRAINT pk_specification_id PRIMARY KEY (specification_id));
